mapper.select: select a.* from barber_role a inner join barber_user_role b on a.id = b.role_id inner join barber_user c on b.user_id = c.id where c.username = #{username}
select a.code, c.href from barber_role a inner join barber_role_menu b on a.id = b.role_id inner join barber_menu c on b.menu_id = c.id where c.type = 0
